titles.title: Pour Out The Wine, Lord, Pour Out The Wine

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Pour out the wine, Lord, pour out the wine.
We are the branches, You are the Vine.
You are the one that crushes all that's mine.
And we will say amen, Lord, pour out the wine.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Break us as bread, Lord, break us as bread
We are the Body, You are the Head
True bread by which the corporate man is fed
And we shall say amen, Lord, break us as bread.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Give us your life, Lord, give us your life
You are the husband, we are the wife
We'll keep submitting till there's no more strife
And we shall say amen, Lord, give us your life.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Pour out your fire, Lord, pour out your fire
You are the only one we desire
It's by Your love that we will rise up higher
And we shall say amen, Lord, pour out your fire.
